QuestData.Title: Even Giants Fall
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari worship the loa; animal spirits they often call to their aid. They may be trying to bind these spirits into a huge golem. The outcome would be disastrous.$b$bI've sent ahead a scout to gather more information, but I think this task may require your expertise.$b$bStop that ritual at all costs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Guardian Tak'u within Conqueror's Terrace.
